title: Liquor shops closed on April 13 and 14
body_lines: The Commissioner General of the Excise Department says that all wine stores and liquor sales outlets will remain closed on April 13 and 14 in view of the Sinhala and Tamil New Year.
Meanwhile licensed wine stores and liquor shops will also be closed on April 16 due to Bak Full Moon Poya Day falling on that date.
